Content.En: I clearly feel like today is Tuesday, but everyone around me says it is Wednesday...
Content.Cn: 明明感觉今天该是周二,可周围所有人都说是周三……

Content.En: I just lost a day inexplicably
Content.Cn: 我就这么莫名其妙地丢掉了一天

Content.En: No... maybe there is another me who replaced me!
Content.Cn: 不对……也许是有另一个我取代了!

Content.En: ...The above is the message you sent me during the holidays. You must have remembered it, right?
Content.Cn: ……上面是假期时你给我发的消息.你应该没忘记吧?

Content.En: I thought of a possibility...the aliens were parasitizing you at that time.
Content.Cn: 我想到一种可能……当时外星人寄生在你身上.

Content.En: Then the aliens parasitize other people, and you wake up.
Content.Cn: 之后外星人寄生到了其他人身上,你就清醒了.

Content.En: Do you feel that something is not right with the people in school... Aliens must still be among us!
Content.Cn: 你有没有觉得,学校里的人不太对劲……外星人一定还在我们之中!
